^@1599.99@^$ 1599.99^@^USD^@@ @61@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@61@^http://www.jlaudio.com/sb-gm-c7cp1-10tw3-car-audio-stealthbox-94605^@^StealthBox^@^SB-GM-C7CP1/10TW3: Stealthbox® for 2014-Up Chevrolet C7 Corvette Coupe (Single Driver)^@^SB-GM-C7CP1/10TW3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t338_92615f31d73191dc1d499d57394a74dc.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t441_x1_92615f31d73191dc1d499d57394a74dc.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t450_x2_92615f31d73191dc1d499d57394a74dc.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x3_92615f31d73191dc1d499d57394a74dc.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t338_92615f31d73191dc1d499d57394a74dc.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-GM-C7CP1/10TW3

The seventh-generation Corvette establishes a new benchmark for performance and style but like most sports cars presents a challenge when it comes to achieving excellent bass performance.

This Stealthbox® solution is engineered for those wanting to keep most of the cargo space in the hatch. It is also designed to install without any screws or bolts and can be removed in seconds for track day and reinstalled just as fast. The factory targa-top stowage is not affected in any way by the Stealthbox® so you can enjoy great bass with or without the top installed.

Inside this Stealthbox® is a potent JL Audio 10-inch thinline subwoofer driver in a sealed enclosure that is expertly matched to the Corvette's acoustics.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2-ohm mono. Installs into driver side hatch storage compartment. Steel mesh grille is included to protect the subwoofer driver. Installation does not affect storage of targa-top. No holes need to be drilled for installation. Easy to remove and replace. Use of driver's side rear storage compartment is lost with installation. Storage compartment lid must be removed for installation but can be replaced if Stealthbox® is removed. Will not fit convertible model.

SB-GM-C7CP2/10TW3

The C7 Corvette offers an aggressive exterior and a jetfighter-like cockpit along with major increases in horsepower torque and technology. Still missing however is a real subwoofer system… even with the premium audio option.

To solve this problem the JL Audio engineers developed a potent Stealthbox® design housing twin 10TW3 subwoofers in a sealed enclosure that mounts ahead of the rear axle so as to preserve precious cargo space and maintain the C7’s excellent weight distribution. With up to 800W of power handling this Stealthbox® delivers amazing sub-bass output matching your Corvette’s powerful engine adding even more enjoyment to every minute you spend on the road.


The Hard Data: Contains two 10TW3-D4 subwoofers in a sealed enclosure. 800 watt power handling. Wired for 4-ohm mono. Installs behind front seats in the forward section of the cargo area. Steel mesh grilles are included to protect the subwoofer drivers.

SB-GM-CLRDO/10W3v3/DG

The Crew Cab versions of GM's mid-size trucks offer excellent space for passengers. Unfortunately they didn't leave a lot of room for a subwoofer. To combat this problem the Stealthbox® design team has developed a unique solution that installs beneath and in front of the center of the back seat. The Stealthbox® does not affect folding of the seats or use of the rear cup holders and delivers exceptional bass output and quality from its 10-inch subwoofer driver.


The Hard Data: Contains one down-firing 10W3v3-2 in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installation does not impede access to jack seat folding functions or usage of cup holders. Last click of front bench seat equipped models is sacrificed by installation. Will not fit Regular Cab Extended Cab Colorado/Canyon Isuzu i-280 or i-290 models!

SB-GM-CLREXT/10W3v3/TN2

The Extended Cab version of GM's mid-size truck has limited back seat space for passengers and certainly no room for a bulky subwoofer enclosure. JL Audio's Stealthbox® design team has developed a clever solution that mounts between the jump seats (creating a nice arm rest for rear passengers) and integrates the jack/tool compartment and cup holders to the front of the Stealthbox®. The installation does not affect folding of the seats and delivers exceptional bass output and quality from its 10-inch JL Audio subwoofer driver.


The Hard Data: Contains one down-firing 10W3v3-2 in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Jack/tools can still be stored in cup-holder unit. Does not impede seat folding functions or usage of cup holders. Will not fit Regular Cab Crew Cab Colorado/Canyon or Isuzu i-350 models!

SB-GM-CTRIP/10TW3/DG

The return of Chevy's iconic Camaro was met with tremendous enthusiasm by those who prize American-style performance. Its muscular looks retro cockpit design and potent powertrain options convincingly recreate the muscle and attitude of the original models.

If you're looking to rock the roads you're eating up in your Camaro you will need to give the stock sound system a serious attitude enhancement. This starts with a true subwoofer.

This Stealthbox® is designed for maximum sub-bass performance with its three 10TW3 JL Audio subwoofer drivers in a 100% fiberglass sealed enclosure. The enclosure is offered finished in a high-grade automotive carpet as well as an unfinished (primered) option which is paint-ready to coordinate with any installation theme.

Turn it up with this anything-but-ordinary bass boost for your Camaro.


The Hard Data: Contains three 10TW3-D4 subwoofer drivers in a sealed enclosure. 1200 watt power handling. Wired for 2.7 ohm mono. Black steel mesh grilles included. Rear seat pass-through functionality is lost with installation. Will not fit convertible models.

SB-GM-EQNX/10W1v3

This generation of GM compact SUV's offers excellent space and utility so the JL Audio R&
column786:
D team focused on delivering a major low frequency improvement without sacrificing even 1 cubic inch of the generous cargo volume that likely played a big role in your purchase decision.

The Stealthbox® for the Equinox/Terrain neatly replaces the OEM ‘subwoofer' located behind the passenger side cargo panel and makes use of the OEM Subwoofer Grille opening.

So keep all your cargo space while adding a serious shot of audio adrenaline to your driving experience.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W1v3-2 subwoofer driver in a sealed enclosure. 300 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono.

Important: Installation of aftermarket audio equipment in 4-cyl Equinox/Terrain vehicles may require disabling the Active Noise Cancellation functionality built into the factory audio system. This is not an issue in 6-cyl models.

SB-GM-ESC/10W1v3/DG

The centerpiece of any serious audio upgrade is an outstanding subwoofer system. For GM's big SUV's we now offer this powerful solution that fits all versions including the luxurious Denali and Escalade models. Featuring a potent pair of 10-inch subwoofer drivers in a sealed enclosure these rear-mounted Stealthbox® systems have the muscle to fill that big space with clean powerful JL Audio bass performance.

The clever design places the enclosure off the floor so that it doesn't take up any useful cargo or people space and the enclosure is positioned so that it will not affect the driver's visibility one bit. The only thing you will be giving up is that weak factory bass performance.

Please note that specific versions are available for the regular and extended wheelbase versions of these vehicles!


The Hard Data: Contains two 10W1v3-2 in a sealed enclosure. 600 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs on the driver side rear window ledge. Steel mesh grilles are included to protect the subwoofer drivers. Will not fit extended wheelbase Chevrolet &
column826:
GMC SUV's. Will not fit models without Power Liftgate option.

SB-GM-HUMRH2/12W6v3/DG

You make a statement with your vehicle now you can make a statement with the way it sounds.

This Stealthbox® houses a premium JL Audio 12-inch subwoofer capable of filling the H2 with superb bass. The Stealthbox® is designed to fit on top of the driver's side cargo area trim panel where it won't interfere with cargo or the spare tire.


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W6v3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 600 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in the driver side rear cargo area on top of the side panel and behind the spare tire mount (if so equipped). A steel mesh grille is included. Minor modification of interior spare tire holder (if so equipped) is necessary driver's side storage pocket is lost. Will not fit Hummer H2 SUT or H3.

SB-GM-HUMRH3/10W1v3

The compact H3 has been a huge success thanks to its combination of style utility and substance. Our Stealthbox® for the H3 achieves the same goals by seamlessly integrating into the H3's hatch without sacrificing any cargo space. The only thing you lose is the weak factory bass.

This Stealthbox® houses a JL Audio 10-inch subwoofer in a compact sealed enclosure that installs inside the H3's driver side hatch trim panel. You can still carry all the gear you want and no one will know it's in there (until you let them listen to your system).


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W1v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 300 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs invisibly behind driver side cargo trim panel. If the vehicle is not equipped with the Monsoon® sound system you must purchase a new driver side rear cargo trim panel from GM parts in order to install the Stealthbox®. If the vehicle is equipped with the Monsoon® sound system installation requires removal of the system amplifier and necessitates the addition of an aftermarket amplifier. Will not fit Hummer H2 or H2 SUT.

SB-GM-SLVCC2/12TW3/BK

Whether your truck is used to work hard or play even harder this vehicle brings a whole lot to the table: from great towing and hauling capabilities to powerful engine options a spacious interior and a smooth ride. Amidst an evolving truck market complicated with special features and touch screens the massive GM Crew Cab trucks have stuck to their model of simplicity and comfort.

Our Stealthbox® enhances this design by adding quality bass without losing precious space or functionality. The Stealthbox® slips under the truck's rear seat and features two of our revolutionary 12TW3 thin-line subwoofers giving you absolutely stellar sub-bass impact and quality. We even left a perfect spot for a clean amplifier installation!


The Hard Data: Contains two 12TW3-D4 subwoofers in a down-firing sealed enclosure. 800 watt power handling. Wired for a 4 ohm load. Installs under rear seat. Will not affect the folding of the rear seat or rear leg room.Will not fit “Classic” models.

SB-GM-SLVCC3/10TW3/BK

This generation of Chevrolet/GMC trucks is bringing new levels of interior refinement and technology to the full-size truck segment. Our Stealthbox® enhances all this by adding impressive high-quality bass without losing any of your precious people space or interior functionality.

The Stealthbox® slips under the truck's rear seat and features two of our revolutionary 10TW3 thin-line subwoofers giving you absolutely stellar sub-bass impact and quality. We even left a perfect spot in the middle of the enclosure for a clean hidden amplifier installation!


The Hard Data: Contains two 10TW3-D4 subwoofers in a down-firing sealed enclosure. 800 watt power handling. Wired for a 4 ohm load. Installs under rear seat. Will not affect the folding of the rear seat or rear leg room.

SB-GM-SLVD/10TW1/BK

Whether your GM truck is used to work hard or play even harder it brings a whole lot to the table including great towing and hauling capabilities a spacious interior and a smooth ride.

Our Stealthbox® enhances your GM truck by adding quality JL Audio bass without losing much of your precious space or interior functionality.

Inside this Stealthbox® two of our revolutionary 10TW1 thin-line subwoofer drivers deliver absolutely stellar sub-bass impact and quality.


The Hard Data: Contains two 10TW1-4 subwoofers in a sealed enclosure. 600 watt power handling. Wired for a 2 ohm load. Installs under rear seat. Will not affect the folding of the rear seat or rear leg room. Installation requires removal of plastic storage tray under rear seat (if equipped). Will not fit Crew Cab or Standard Cab trucks.

SB-GM-TAHOCNSL/10W1v3

This generation of GM's big trucks and SUV's sets new standards for interior quality and luxury. There also isn't much wasted space in which to install a conventional subwoofer design without giving up cargo and people space.

Our Stealthbox® solution installs inside the forward section of the factory center console for complete invisibility. Intense up-front bass is produced by a down-firing 10-inch subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. The console's functionality and storage space is unaffected by the Stealthbox®.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W1v3-2 in a sealed enclosure. 300 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Stealthbox® installs inside forward-most portion of front center console and replaces the OEM “subwoofer” system if vehicle is so equipped. Will not fit Trucks with AC vents on the back of the center console or vehicles with deep storage area in front of cup holders. Will not fit Full-Size “Classic” Trucks Chevrolet SSR Cadillac Escalade Cadillac Escalade ESV Cadillac Escalade EXT Hummer H2 Hummer H2 SUT.

SB-GM-TRLBLZR/10W3v3/DG

GM's popular mid-sized SUV's have a lot of room for people and gear so we designed a Stealthbox® that wouldn't compromise these benefits. A powerful 10-inch subwoofer fires from the rear corner of the hatch area filling the interior with smooth powerful JL Audio sub-bass.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in the passenger side rear cargo area. Black steel mesh grille included. Not compatible with optional GM cargo organizer. Will fit Chevrolet Trailblazer SS model. Will not fit Trailblazer EXT Envoy XL Envoy XUV Envoy Denali XL or Isuzu Ascender.

SB-H-CRV2/10TW3/DG

The 4th generation of Honda's popular CR-V offers even more space than its predecessor providing ample room for people and cargo. Unfortunately none of the factory audio options offer anything resembling powerful accurate bass response.

To address this shortcoming we engineered a compact Stealthbox® solution that tucks into the corner of the hatch area while still leaving plenty of room for all the stuff you want to carry. Inside the Stealthbox® is one of our incredibly thin 10-inch TW3 drivers to fill the CR-V’s cabin with smooth powerful bass.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 Watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs against passenger-side wheel well. Stealthbox® includes a black steel-mesh grille to protect the driver. Will not fit early 2012 3rd Generation models.

SB-H-ELMNT/10W3v3/BK

Honda designed the Element to be versatile and practical. Our Stealthbox® allows it to sound great at the same time by delivering awesome up-front bass performance. The down-firing design of this system allows for maximum low frequency output while providing complete protection for the woofer.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Replaces the factory “subwoofer” system or storage bin located at the bottom of the dash and between the two front seats. Will not fit Element SC model.

SB-H-PLT/10TW3

The Honda Pilot brings a unique blend of function and style to the category of midsize crossover vehicles. Offering a comfortable ride and three rows of seating the Pilot remains a top choice for those who appreciate dependable spacious transportation. Despite all its design intelligence the Pilot offers little in the way of good-sounding bass from its two audio system options.


Lucky for you JL Audio's engineers have designed a StealthBox® that tucks neatly in the rear cargo floor of the vehicle bringing an incredible amount of bass to the Pilot without taking away any of the comfort and space that drew you to purchase this vehicle in the first place.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Mounts under rear cargo floor.

SB-H-RIDGLNE/10W3v3/GA

It is clear that Honda did not follow a conventional pick-up truck template when they designed the Ridgeline. From its unit-body construction to its lockable bed storage compartment the Ridgeline sets itself apart from the herd.

The versatile and comfortable interior design does not leave much room for a big subwoofer system so our Stealthbox® team focused on engineering a compact solution that installs beneath the rear seat and uses slot-loading to generate clean powerful bass response.

Combined with our component speakers this Stealthbox® can make every journey a great sounding one without messing with your truck's utility and functionality.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Mounts under passenger side rear seat.

SB-H-S2000/10W3v3

Honda's stellar sports car deserves a killer sound system but integrating a capable subwoofer can be an exercise in frustration (especially if you want to keep any trunk space). Our Stealthbox® for the S-2000 slips into the recessed well in the trunk and includes a sturdy grille cover (carpeted to match the trunk) so you can still carry all of life's necessities.

The powerful 10-inch subwoofer delivers deep rich bass with the roof up or down making each drive in your S-2000 even more exciting.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 in a sealed enclosure firing up from the bottom of the lower trunk cavity. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. A carpeted grille panel is included. Minimal trunk space is sacrificed. Jack and tools must be relocated.

SB-H-XTOUR/10W3v3

Our Stealthbox® for the Crosstour features a powerful JL Audio 10-inch subwoofer housed in a compact sealed fiberglass enclosure and fits neatly into the passenger side rear corner of the hatch area. The form-fitting design conserves your valuable cargo space while still permitting full access to under-floor storage and the spare tire.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included. Installs in passenger-side corner of cargo area. Installation requires disabling the active noise canceling feature of this vehicle.

SB-HY-ELANMD-12W3v3

We simply couldn't overlook the thousands of happy Elantra drivers who have chosen this great little sedan as transportation. We also couldn't help noticing that the stock stereo could use some serious improvement in the bass frequencies. After setting out to find the perfect remedy and applying everything we know about world-class sub-bass we have some great audio news for Elantra owners.

Our Stealthbox® for the Elantra features a robust JL Audio 12-inch subwoofer housed in a compact sealed fiberglass enclosure which fits neatly into the passenger side rear corner of the trunk. The form-fitting design conserves your valuable trunk space while still permitting full access to the spare tire. A clean-looking steel mesh grille protects your investment from loose cargo.


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included. Installs in passenger-side corner of trunk compartment.

^@699.99@^$ 699.99^@^USD^@@ @325@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@325@^http://www.jlaudio.com/car-audio-stealthbox-hyundai-genesis^@^StealthBox^@^SB-HY-GENSIS/10TW3: Stealthbox® for 2009-Up Hyundai Genesis Coupe^@^SB-HY-GENSIS/10TW3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t362_3ae05b0d0d9a089d89d73fe2425f8627.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_3ae05b0d0d9a089d89d73fe2425f8627.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t450_x2_3ae05b0d0d9a089d89d73fe2425f8627.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t362_3ae05b0d0d9a089d89d73fe2425f8627.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-HY-GENSIS/10TW3

Sleek looks and outstanding rear-wheel-drive performance make the Genesis Coupe a blast to own. If only the audio system didn't bring it down... hmmm.

Our Stealthbox® for the Genesis Coupe is the perfect place to start your audio upgrade. It features a robust JL Audio TW3 10-inch subwoofer housed in a compact sealed fiberglass enclosure which fits neatly into the passenger side rear corner of the trunk. The form-fitting design conserves your valuable trunk space while still permitting full access to the spare tire. A clean-looking steel mesh grille protects your investment from loose cargo.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in the passenger side of trunk compartment. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included. Installation requires permanent modification of the OEM cargo area floor. Will not fit the Genesis sedan.

^@649.99@^$ 649.99^@^USD^@@ @329@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@329@^http://www.jlaudio.com/car-audio-stealthbox-hyundai-santa-fe-sport^@^StealthBox^@^SB-HY-SNTFES/10TW3/DG: Stealthbox® for 2013-Up Hyundai Santa Fe Sport with Black/Black interior^@^SB-HY-SNTFES/10TW3/DG^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_9612a7d45eaa17cfad8018deb7060d87.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x1_9612a7d45eaa17cfad8018deb7060d87.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x2_9612a7d45eaa17cfad8018deb7060d87.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t450_x3_9612a7d45eaa17cfad8018deb7060d87.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_9612a7d45eaa17cfad8018deb7060d87.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-HY-SNTFES/10TW3/DG

The cleverly redesigned Hyundai Santa Fe Sport has been highly ranked for its affordability and functionality. Unfortunately Hyundai did not cater to lovers of great sub-bass when they designed the audio systems for this popular crossover.

At JL Audio we put those needs first so we came up with the perfect solution to your Santa Fe's shortcomings: a Stealthbox® featuring one of our revolutionary 10-inch TW3 thin-line subwoofers. This sleek little woofer offers an insane amount of bass from small box volumes and is installed in a form-fitting Stealthbox® that tucks into the driver-side corner of the hatch area without any significant cargo space penalty.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. A steel mesh grille is included. Will not fit larger SantaFe model with third row seats.

SB-HY-SON/12W3v3

Hyundai's Sonata offers outstanding value and refinement giving many luxury cars a good run for their money. As great as the Sonata is the factory sound system can definitely benefit from a serious upgrade in the bass department.

Our Stealthbox® for the Sonata features a robust JL Audio 12-inch subwoofer housed in a compact sealed fiberglass enclosure which fits neatly into the passenger side rear corner of the trunk. The form-fitting design conserves your valuable trunk space while still permitting full access to the spare tire. A clean-looking steel mesh grille protects your investment from loose cargo.

With the unmatched clarity and output of an enclosed subwoofer system built and tuned specifically for your vehicle you're sure to look forward to each turn of the key.


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. A steel mesh grille is included.

SB-HY-VELOSTR/10TW3

Hyundai's funky Veloster defies categorization and offers a great combination of style practicality and clever packaging. The stock audio system however is not going to win any awards.

Our Stealthbox® for the Veloster is your best first step towards correcting this audio deficiency. It features a potent JL Audio 10-inch subwoofer housed in a compact sealed fiberglass enclosure that fits neatly into the passenger side rear corner of the trunk. The form-fitting design conserves your valuable hatch space while still permitting full access to the spare tire. A clean-looking steel mesh grille protects your investment from loose cargo.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in passenger side of rear cargo area. A steel mesh grille is included.

SB-IN-G35CPE/10W1v3

The G35 Coupe offers a compelling blend of luxury and high-performance. The addition of a JL Audio Stealthbox® system makes it even more exciting.

For a vehicle with a trunk small enough to warrant specific instructions on how to load two golf bags we knew we had to integrate this Stealthbox® without taking up too much space. The final design tucks under the trunk floor wrapping around the spare tire. The selected location ensures the woofer is protected and out of sight while providing optimal sub-bass performance.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W1v3-2 subwoofer in an a sealed enclosure. 300 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs under trunk floor. The trunk carpet covers the Stealthbox®. The factory amplifier must be removed or relocated with installation. Will not fit models equipped with 4-Wheel Active Steer Package. Will not fit Infiniti G35 Sedan (4-door) G37 or Nissan 350Z Altima Coupe.

^@599.99@^$ 599.99^@^USD^@@ @307@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@307@^http://www.jlaudio.com/sb-j-gchwk2-10w3v3-bk-car-audio-stealthbox-94508^@^StealthBox^@^SB-J-GCHWK2/10W3v3/BK: Stealthbox® for 2011-Up Jeep Grand Cherokee with Black or Light Frost interior^@^SB-J-GCHWK2/10W3v3/BK^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_34be19dd632041a9685e36d58c3280b3.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_34be19dd632041a9685e36d58c3280b3.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t450_x2_34be19dd632041a9685e36d58c3280b3.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_34be19dd632041a9685e36d58c3280b3.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-J-GCHWK2/10W3v3/BK

The Grand Cherokee's pedigree for off-road prowess comfort and everyday utility is well-represented by this generation of the venerable nameplate. We know that Jeep owners value the “go-anywhere do-anything” capabilities of their vehicles. A bulky subwoofer enclosure that takes up valuable cargo space is not part of that experience so we are pleased to present this beautiful Stealthbox® solution for the Jeep Grand Cherokee owner seeking great audio performance.

The Stealthbox® replaces the OEM “subwoofer” with a sealed enclosure housing a potent 10-inch JL Audio subwoofer driver. The enclosure installs in the passenger side rear corner of the cargo area without interfering with under-floor storage or cargo tie-down fixtures while the included steel mesh grille keeps the driver safe from cargo-related mishaps.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included. Installs into passenger-side rear cargo panel and requires removal of factory “subwoofer” if so equipped.

^@699.99@^$ 699.99^@^USD^@@ @306@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@306@^http://www.jlaudio.com/sb-j-unltd4d-13tw5v2-bk-car-audio-stealthbox-94419^@^StealthBox^@^SB-J-UNLTD4D/13TW5v2/BK: Stealthbox® for 2007-2012 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited with Black Trunk^@^SB-J-UNLTD4D/13TW5v2/BK^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_d86748d9992852108955bc4042ac0128.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_d86748d9992852108955bc4042ac0128.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t365_x2_d86748d9992852108955bc4042ac0128.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t458_x3_d86748d9992852108955bc4042ac0128.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x4_d86748d9992852108955bc4042ac0128.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_d86748d9992852108955bc4042ac0128.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-J-UNLTD4D/13TW5v2/BK

Jeep® certainly hit a grand-slam when it added a second set of doors to the Wrangler® platform but the factory audio system can definitely use some help.

Our Stealthbox® for the Wrangler Unlimited® is designed to provide powerful audiophile bass quality without significantly compromising your precious cargo space. Our patented low-profile TW5 subwoofer technology makes it possible to extract amazing bass from a very thin enclosure that bolts solidly to the passenger-side rear wheel well. Rugged 100% fiberglass construction is as tough as your Jeep® and the protected driver position means that you can still toss all your gear in the back without worrying about damage. It also won't call attention to itself in parking lots... even if you have a ragtop.

So whether your adventures are urban suburban or on the roughest trails... this Stealthbox® will make them all more exciting.


The Hard Data: Contains one 13TW5v2-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 600 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs against passenger-side wheel well. Requires removal of factory “subwoofer if so equipped. For model years 2011-Up with a 12V accessory plug on the rear passenger side cargo panel/subwoofer you must purchase a plain (without subwooofer) passenger side rear cargo trim panel (part #1pu12dx9ag) and a cover for the upper seat belt / roll bar (part #1pu18dx9ad) from Jeep/Mopar parts. Use of the accessory outlet is lost with Stealthbox® installation.

^@949.99@^$ 949.99^@^USD^@@ @57@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@57@^http://www.jlaudio.com/sb-j-wrud-10tw1-car-audio-stealthbox-94606^@^StealthBox^@^SB-J-WRUD/10TW1/BK (DRIVER): Stealthbox® for 2007-Up Jeep Wrangler Unlimited with Black Trunk (Driver Side)^@^SB-J-WRUD/10TW1/BK (DRIVER)^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t328_8170189918a42d6a5aeb7b52e1d071c5.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_8170189918a42d6a5aeb7b52e1d071c5.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t458_x2_8170189918a42d6a5aeb7b52e1d071c5.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x3_8170189918a42d6a5aeb7b52e1d071c5.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t328_8170189918a42d6a5aeb7b52e1d071c5.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-J-WRUD/10TW1/BK (DRIVER)

Whether your adventures are urban suburban or on the roughest trails... these Stealthbox® systems for the 4-door Wrangler Unlimited will make them all more exciting.

These systems are designed to provide powerful audiophile bass quality without significantly compromising precious cargo space. Our patented low-profile thinline subwoofer technology extracts amazing bass from very thin enclosures that bolt solidly above each rear wheel well. Rugged 100% fiberglass construction is as tough as your Jeep® and sturdy steel-mesh grilles mean you can still toss all your gear in the back without worrying about damage.

Because Jeep® owners customize their vehicles in all kinds of creative ways the driver side and passenger side Stealthbox® systems are sold individually. A single one is enough for most people to be very happy but you can go for two if maximum performance is your goal.


The Hard Data: Each system contains one 10TW1-4 in a sealed enclosure with 300 watt power handling. Each enclosure is wired for 4 ohms (using two achieves a 2 ohm load in parallel). A steel mesh grille is included with each to protect the subwoofer driver. Each enclosure installs above one rear wheel well with specific models for passenger and driver side. Does not affect hard top installation.

^@599.99@^$ 599.99^@^USD^@@ @260@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@260@^http://www.jlaudio.com/sb-k-sl-12w0v3-car-audio-stealthbox-94493^@^StealthBox^@^SB-K-SL/12W0v3: Stealthbox® for 2010-2013 Kia Soul^@^SB-K-SL/12W0v3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t339_ee743999ace8db0fc096580bc4521a57.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_ee743999ace8db0fc096580bc4521a57.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t339_x2_ee743999ace8db0fc096580bc4521a57.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t450_x3_ee743999ace8db0fc096580bc4521a57.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x4_ee743999ace8db0fc096580bc4521a57.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t339_ee743999ace8db0fc096580bc4521a57.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-K-SL/12W0v3

The Kia Soul is a stylish and affordable transportation solution begging for some serious audio quality.

To address this our Stealthbox® design team took on the challenge of creating stunning bass output and quality while keeping the Soul's utility essentially unchanged. We start by replacing the foam cargo organizer beneath the hatch floor with a custom-fitted fiberglass enclosure housing a powerful 12-inch JL Audio Subwoofer Driver in a downfiring slot-loaded configuration. We also engineered a solid new mounting provision for the spare tire and a storage tray onto the top of the enclosure: a perfect spot for your amplifier installation (see in-car photo for example).

In the end this Stealthbox® is invisible to prying eyes leaves plenty of storage space and provides simply invincible bass performance! How could it get any better?


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W0v3-4 in a sealed enclosure. 300 watt power handling. Installs beneath trunk floor. Requires removal of Styrofoam cargo organizer and relocation of spare tire to passenger's side of hatch with provided fixture. A StealhMod® system solution is also available which adds front speakers amplifier and wiring.

SB-K-SORNTO/10TW3/DG

Kia's mid-size SUV has shot up the sales charts by offering tremendous value and excellent space for people and cargo. The audio system on the other hand could use some help. That's where this Stealthbox® solution comes into play delivering a massive improvement over the factory subwoofer without sacrificing the utility of your Sorento.

Our advanced-technology thin-line 10-inch TW3 subwoofer driver and a form-fitting enclosure design conserve your valuable hatch space while still permitting full access to the spare tire. A clean-looking steel mesh grille protects your investment from loose cargo.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in the driver side rear cargo area. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included. Installation requires removal of OEM subwoofer.

^@699.99@^$ 699.99^@^USD^@@ @169@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@169@^http://www.jlaudio.com/car-audio-stealthbox-land-rover-lr4^@^StealthBox^@^SB-LR-4/10TW3: Stealthbox® for 2009-Up Land Rover LR4^@^SB-LR-4/10TW3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t363_e1e51d0658c44ceb6ec764a61dec9f22.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_e1e51d0658c44ceb6ec764a61dec9f22.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t450_x2_e1e51d0658c44ceb6ec764a61dec9f22.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t363_e1e51d0658c44ceb6ec764a61dec9f22.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-LR-4/10TW3

Land Rover’s more than capable midsize SUV combines a rugged handsome exterior with a luxuriously refined cabin. Unfortunately the spacious cabin does not offer much room for a real subwoofer system if you also want to keep your cargo space and seating functionality.

To address this dilemma JL Audio’s engineers have designed a Stealthbox® that tucks neatly in the driver’s side rear cargo area. Combining our advanced-technology thin-line 10-inch TW3 subwoofer with a form-fitting enclosure design this Stealthbox® produces powerful controlled bass output while conserving your valuable cargo space and maintaining third row seat functionality.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2-ohm mono. Installs in the driver side rear cargo area. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included. If the vehicle is equipped with the rubber cargo liner it will need to be cut for proper fitment and easy removal.

SB-MI-OUTLND/10TW3

If you opted for the third row of seating in your Mitsubishi Outlander finding space to fit a subwoofer without interfering with the car’s functionality presents a difficult challenge. Luckily we’ve come up with a sleek solution that won’t interfere with rear seating or space. Centered around a 10-inch thin line subwoofer driver that operates best inside of compact enclosures this StealthBox is the piece of the party puzzle your Outlander is missing.

Our Stealthbox® for the Outlander features a robust JL Audio 10TW3 subwoofer driver housed in a compact sealed fiberglass enclosure that fits neatly into the driver side rear corner of the hatch. The form-fitting design conserves your valuable hatch space while still permitting full use of the 3rd row seat. A clean-looking steel mesh grille protects your investment from loose cargo.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. A steel mesh grille is included to protect the subwoofer driver. Installs in the driver side of the rear cargo area and permits full use of the 3rd Row Seating. Will not fit Outlander Sport. Requires removal of Rockford-Fosgate® OEM Subwoofer if vehicle is so equipped.

SB-N-350/10W3v3

When Nissan resurrected the legendary Z-car we immediately started receiving requests for a unique Stealthbox® solution. Our design team sprang into action and came up with this beautiful system. To ensure smooth and powerful performance the 350-Z Stealthbox® uses twin 10-inch subwoofers. In addition the enclosure is situated to preserve the Z's handling balance and integrate beautifully with the interior.


The Hard Data: Contains two 10W3v3-4 subwoofers in a sealed enclosure. 1000 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs ahead of the rear strut brace. Will not fit the 350Z convertible model or Infiniti G35 Coupe. Installation requires removal of the child safety seat "

SB-N-370/10W3v3

Nissan's thoroughbred sports car offers an impressive combination of finesse and brute force just like a Stealthbox®.

For the 370Z the JL Audio design team arrived at a solution housing twin 10W3v3 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure that mounts ahead of the rear axle so as to preserve precious cargo space and maintain the car's excellent weight distribution. The enclosure is carefully form fitted to the space to extract maximum useful volume and blends beautifully with the Z's interior panels.

With up to 1000W of power handling this Stealthbox® will transform your Z into a serious music playback machine that will add enjoyment to every minute you spend on the road.


The Hard Data: Contains two 10W3v3-4 subwoofers in a sealed enclosure. 1000 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs behind front seats in the forward section of the cargo area. Steel mesh grilles are included to protect the subwoofer drivers. Will not fit the 370Z convertible model.

^@999.99@^$ 999.99^@^USD^@@ @303@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@303@^http://www.jlaudio.com/car-audio-stealthbox-nissan-altima^@^StealthBox^@^SB-N-ALT/10W3v3: Stealthbox® for 2007-2012 Nissan Altima Sedan 4dr (excludes Hybrid)^@^SB-N-ALT/10W3v3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t366_bb93c69868cf6a82cbe21a979cd819ef.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_bb93c69868cf6a82cbe21a979cd819ef.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t546_x2_bb93c69868cf6a82cbe21a979cd819ef.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x3_bb93c69868cf6a82cbe21a979cd819ef.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t366_bb93c69868cf6a82cbe21a979cd819ef.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-N-ALT/10W3v3

Nissan's mid-size sedan is a perennial best-seller for its strong combination of performance value and looks... but the sound system options are all pretty weak in the low-frequency department.

To tackle this problem our design team formulated a vehicle-specific design for Altima owners that sounds amazing and takes up very little cargo space. This intelligent solution tucks into the rear corner of the trunk and houses a powerful 10-inch JL Audio driver in a sealed fiberglass enclosure. Bass output and quality are simply stunning.

If have you have been considering remedying that weak sounding factory bass or building a complete aftermarket dream system this Stealthbox® is a fantastic starting point.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs against driver side wheel well. Stealthbox® includes black steel-mesh grille to protect the driver. Will not fit Altima Coupe (2-Door) Models. Will not fit Altima Hybrid.

^@649.99@^$ 649.99^@^USD^@@ @301@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@301@^http://www.jlaudio.com/sb-n-juk-12w3v3-car-audio-stealthbox-94559^@^StealthBox^@^SB-N-JUK/12W3v3: Stealthbox® for 2011-Up Nissan Juke^@^SB-N-JUK/12W3v3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t517_80a28c6c28cc013efc73fe1375018f36.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_80a28c6c28cc013efc73fe1375018f36.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t517_x2_80a28c6c28cc013efc73fe1375018f36.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t518_x3_80a28c6c28cc013efc73fe1375018f36.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t517_80a28c6c28cc013efc73fe1375018f36.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-N-JUK/12W3v3

After 100 years of car manufacturers cranking out vehicle designs Nissan has managed to come up with something really fresh. The Juke’s unique melding of a sports car and SUV is pure fun and just begs for serious audio to complete the experience.

We could have used a ten-inch subwoofer and achieved great performance but instead we chose to go with our super-potent 12W3v3 12-inch driver for truly jaw-dropping bass power and extension. The down-firing design creates excellent bass loading while also protecting the woofer from damage.

The whole Stealthbox® installs under the hatch floor and around your spare tire making it invisible to prying eyes and keeping it out of your way when you want to load your Juke up with all of life's necessities.


Contains one 12W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 300 Watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs beneath the rear cargo area floor. Installation requires removal of plastic storage tray and relocation of the vehicle's jack and tools. Will not fit All-Wheel-Drive Juke.

Let's face it... your Titan's factory subwoofer is a toy. This one isn't employing two 10-inch JL Audio subwoofers in a powerful sealed enclosure to deliver rich deep bass performance worthy of Nissan's big truck.

The Stealthbox® installs neatly under the rear seat leaving plenty of room next to it for amplifier mounting and installation.


The Hard Data: Contains two 10W1v2-4 subwoofers in a sealed enclosure. 600 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs under rear bench seat. Will not fit Titan King Cab.

^@849.99@^$ 849.99^@^USD^@@ @293@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@293@^http://www.jlaudio.com/sb-n-xterr2-12w3v3-car-audio-stealthbox-94270^@^StealthBox^@^SB-N-XTERR2/12W3v3: Stealthbox® for 2005-Up Xterra^@^SB-N-XTERR2/12W3v3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t335_be727c44ee2c2995d4b5e391a557da3c.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t401_x1_be727c44ee2c2995d4b5e391a557da3c.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t450_x2_be727c44ee2c2995d4b5e391a557da3c.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x3_be727c44ee2c2995d4b5e391a557da3c.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t335_be727c44ee2c2995d4b5e391a557da3c.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-N-XTERR2/12W3v3

The Xterra has been a solid success for Nissan thanks to its utility ruggedness and versatility. When considering a subwoofer upgrade you don't want to give any of that up... you just want great bass added to the Xterra's long list of bonuses.

To accomplish this the Stealthbox® tucks neatly into the side panel of the cargo area and sacrifices very little cargo space while also staying out of the way of the rear speaker locations and cargo cover.

Lurking inside is a single 12-inch subwoofer that packs a wallop and delivers outstanding fidelity. The subwoofer driver is protected from loose cargo by the included steel mesh grille so you can load up your hatch without worries.


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W3v3-2 in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Stealthbox® installs in passenger side rear cargo area. A steel mesh grille is included to protect the subwoofer driver.

^@749.99@^$ 749.99^@^USD^@@ @241@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@241@^http://www.jlaudio.com/sb-p-987c-13tw5v2-car-audio-stealthbox-94555^@^StealthBox^@^SB-P-987C/13TW5v2: Stealthbox® for 2006-2013 Porsche Cayman (987)^@^SB-P-987C/13TW5v2^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t562_0efcd144f005445e2599c5427ca613f7.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t399_x1_0efcd144f005445e2599c5427ca613f7.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t450_x2_0efcd144f005445e2599c5427ca613f7.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t562_0efcd144f005445e2599c5427ca613f7.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-P-987C/13TW5v2

The Cayman is a pure athlete—light in weight balanced and completely competent on the street (or on the track.) Where it needs some help is in the audio department.

To address this we’ve devised a compact Stealthbox® solution that mounts firmly in the hatch area with a simple pair of straps. This allows you to quickly remove and reinstall the Stealthbox® for track days or when you need extra cargo space.

The sealed enclosure design houses our patented thin-line 13TW5v2 driver to deliver amazing low-frequency impact and sound quality. The enclosure is not visible through the hatch glass. A steel mesh grille protects the subwoofer from loose cargo.


The Hard Data: Contains one 13TW5v2-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 600 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in the hatch compartment with straps for quick removal. No drilling required for installation. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included.

SB-P-996/13TW5v2

For the classic Porsche 911 we’ve devised a low-profile Stealthbox® solution that mounts firmly behind the rear seats on the cargo shelf. The sealed enclosure design houses two (yes two) down-firing thin-line 13.5-inch drivers to deliver serious low-frequency impact and sound quality.

You won’t believe the jaw-dropping bass produced by this system!


The Hard Data: Contains two 13TW5v2-4 subwoofers in a sealed enclosure. 1200 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Black steel mesh woofer grilles are included. Requires removal of OEM subwoofer if so equipped.

SB-S-BRZFRS/10TW3

Somebody finally paid attention and designed a no-nonsense back-to-basics sports car that puts the emphasis on driving enjoyment. Now all you need to do is add a healthy dose of JL Audio to ratchet up the listening enjoyment and make every drive even more memorable.

Our patented 10TW3 thin-line driver is the engine inside this Stealthbox® system and it produces spectacular results from its perch in the passenger side rear corner of the trunk. Your trunk remains completely useful and your installation is neat and secure. A grille is also included to protect your investment.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in the passenger side of trunk compartment. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included.

SB-SC-TCG2/10W3v3

Scion's sporty hatchback delivers astonishing refinement and value and a very healthy amount of useful cargo space.

The good news is that achieving superior sub-bass in your Scion does not require that you sacrifice a single one of the conveniences you drove off the lot with including that cavernous hatch.

Our custom-engineered sealed Stealthbox® for the tC mounts securely on the passenger side of the hatch to achieve impressive output and fidelity with its 10-inch JL Audio subwoofer driver. Usable trunk space is barely affected and a steel mesh grille is included to protect the driver from all the stuff that still fits in your hatch.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included. Installs on passenger-side rear wheel well.

SB-SC-XB/12W3v3

The xB is a vehicle for those who value form function and individual style. Unfortunately the factory and dealer-installed audio systems are less than exciting in the bass department (unless you like weak distorted bass).

If you prefer powerful tight and accurate bass we now have the perfect solution in the form of a 12-inch W3v3 subwoofer driver in a sealed fiberglass enclosure that nestles seamlessly into the passenger side cargo area retaining your usable cargo space and full-access to the spare tire. So get rid of that fuzzy woofer box that keeps getting in your way and treat yourself to some serious bass performance.


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Stealthbox® includes a black steel-mesh grille to protect the driver. Accessory cargo cover will not fit with Stealthbox® installed.

SB-SMRT-4-2/8W3v3

There are a lot of design areas where the Smart fortwo is brilliant... but the weak factory audio system isn't one of them.

Facing the obvious limitations of space and functionality presented by this diminutive automobile the JL Audio Stealthbox® design team had to reach deep into their bag of tricks. Their solution is a robust JL Audio 8-inch subwoofer tucked neatly beneath the dashboard in a 100% fiberglass sealed enclosure resulting in zero loss of useful space.

So fill the CD changer or plug in your MP3 player and enjoy impressive JL Audio sound quality on every drive.


The Hard Data: Contains one 8W3v3-4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 250 watt power handling. Wired for 4 ohm mono. Installs underneath passenger-side dash. Stealthbox® includes a black steel-mesh grille to protect the driver. Storage of any type of magnetic-drive media player in the glove box is not recommended with Stealthbox® installed.

SB-T-CMRY/12W3v3

The Toyota Camry is firmly planted on top of the best-seller lists for lots of good practical reasons. Despite all its virtues and whether or not your Camry came equipped with the premium audio upgrade it could definitely use some help in the low frequency department.

The great news is that with the introduction of this Stealthbox® you no longer need to give up much trunk space to get the sub-bass just right in America's favorite sedan.

Using the robust and smooth-sounding 12W3v3 12-inch subwoofer we have created a potent solution that installs solidly in the rear corner of the trunk. You'll get deep bass extension solid impact and years of listening satisfaction.


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Stealthbox® includes a black steel-mesh grille to protect the driver. Optional Toyota Cargo Tray and Cargo Net will not fit with Stealthbox® installed. Will not fit Hybrid Models.

^@699.99@^$ 699.99^@^USD^@@ @194@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@194@^http://www.jlaudio.com/car-audio-stealthbox-toyota-corolla^@^StealthBox^@^SB-T-CROLA/12W3v3: Stealthbox® for 2010-2013 Toyota Corolla^@^SB-T-CROLA/12W3v3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t340_2ebf05da64e6bbb03b5f679fd7ec5a70.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t400_x1_2ebf05da64e6bbb03b5f679fd7ec5a70.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t482_x2_2ebf05da64e6bbb03b5f679fd7ec5a70.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x3_2ebf05da64e6bbb03b5f679fd7ec5a70.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t340_2ebf05da64e6bbb03b5f679fd7ec5a70.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-T-CROLA/12W3v3

The best-selling car in history is known to offer a great combination of comfort value and reliability. What it doesn't offer is great sounding audio especially in the low frequency department.

With the addition of this Stealthbox® it is now possible to achieve powerful and accurate bass response in the Corolla sedan without giving up too much useful space.Using the robust and smooth-sounding 12W3v3 12-inch subwoofer we have created a potent solution that installs solidly in the driver-side rear corner of the trunk leaving plenty of room for all of life's necessities.

Unleashing the audio potential of your Corolla has never been easier.


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W3v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Stealthbox® includes a black steel-mesh grille to protect the driver. Optional Toyota Cargo Tray and Cargo Net will not fit with Stealthbox® installed. During installation a slit must be cut in the trunk floor carpet to allow the trunk floor carpet to be lifted for spare tire access.

SB-T-FJ/12W1v3

The FJ Cruiser makes a bold statement by combining modern vehicle dynamics with dramatic styling that pays homage to the original Land Cruiser. For those seeking a superior audio experience without compromising the Cruiser's utility this Stealthbox® represents the perfect solution. A powerful 12-inch driver delivers outstanding impact and fidelity without encroaching on the FJ's useful cargo space and a steel mesh grille provides protection when you load up the hatch with gear.


The Hard Data: Contains one 12W1v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 300 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs on passenger side wheel well. Steel-mesh grille included. Replaces OEM “subwoofer” system if vehicle is so equipped.

SB-T-TACDC12/10TW3

Toyota’s Tacoma Double Cab has a highly optimized interior design with almost zero wasted space. This makes integrating a serious subwoofer a pretty major challenge but not one that our design team could not overcome.

Utilizing the small box prowess and shallow mounting depth of our 10TW3 subwoofer we sculpted a Stealthbox® to fit snugly behind the rear seat while also providing a mounting location for one of our amplifiers.

The results are stunning: real deep sub-bass and totally undisturbed interior comfort and utility.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in storage pocket behind the passenger side rear seat. The enclosure features a recess on the front for a small amplifier to be mounted. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included.

SB-T-TUNDC/8W7/BK

Toyota definitely dropped the gauntlet on the industry with this incarnation of the full-size Tundra. Offering amazing space for people and cargo it can do almost anything.

Where this big truck needs some help is in the audio department where a quality sub-bass solution is desperately needed. To this end our Stealthbox® team enlisted our flagship 8-inch W7 subwoofer in a precisely tuned ported alignment that fires towards the back wall of the cab for incredible bass impact and fidelity (and keeps the woofer out of sight and out of harm's way).

Bass excellence awaits you.


The Hard Data: Contains one 8W7AE-3 subwoofer in a ported enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 3 ohm mono. Installs under driver-side rear seat and requires no permanent modifications to the vehicle. Will not fit Tundra CrewMax.

SB-VW-CC/10W3v3

Our Stealthbox design for the CC sneaks behind the factory trim panel in the trunk compartment where it remains completely invisible and takes up zero cargo space. Inside is a powerful 10W3v3 driver. We also include a grille kit for the rear deck to allow the bass energy to enter the cabin with maximum impact and fidelity.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3 subwoofer driver in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in the trunk behind factory trim panel. Will not fit V6 models with battery in Stealthbox® mounting location.

^@649.99@^$ 649.99^@^USD^@@ @314@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@314@^http://www.jlaudio.com/car-audio-stealthbox-volkswagen-golf^@^StealthBox^@^SB-VW-GLF4/10W3v3: Stealthbox® for 1999?-2005 Volkswagen Golf IV (A4) 2dr/4dr^@^SB-VW-GLF4/10W3v3^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t483_3279faca00dfc895b63e68ea97cd95de.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t303_x1_3279faca00dfc895b63e68ea97cd95de.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t483_x2_3279faca00dfc895b63e68ea97cd95de.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_x3_3279faca00dfc895b63e68ea97cd95de.jpg?1426543231; http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t483_3279faca00dfc895b63e68ea97cd95de.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

SB-VW-GLF4/10W3v3

Here's a twist you probably haven't seen anywhere else... A monster subwoofer system in a Golf that hardly takes up any useful space and let's you keep your spare tire too!

The crazy shape of this Stealthbox® lets you place it under your factory spare tire (the full-size one) for a super stealthy end result and phenomenal bass output from the down-firing slot-loaded 10-inch subwoofer.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 in a down-firing sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in spare tire well... spare tire installs onto the Stealthbox® raising hatch floor 2 inches from stock height. A special kit is provided to raise the entire hatch floor maintaining its flatness. Stealthbox® can also be installed without the spare tire retaining stock hatch depth. Will not fit 4-Motion R32. Will not fit pre-'99½ Golf III (A3 platform) or '05½-Up Golf V (A5 platform).

SB-VW-GTI/10TW3

Because hatch space is limited in the MkV Golf we worked very hard to tuck our Stealthbox® out of the way while still providing a high-performance sub-bass experience. Every cubic inch of available space in the left rear corner of the hatch is used thanks to Stealthbox® fiberglass construction.

Our thin TW3 subwoofer is a natural choice for its outstanding performance in small sealed enclosures as well as its unparalleled sound quality attributes and high output capabilities.

So while other Golf drivers struggle with small weak subwoofer solutions (or big silly ones) you can enjoy top-shelf bass and get on with your life.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10TW3-D4 in a sealed enclosure. 400 watt power handling. Wired for a 2 ohm load. Installs in the driver side rear corner of the trunk. Minimal loss of trunk space. Black steel mesh woofer grille included.

SB-VW-JETNCS-10W1v3

The joy of driving this affordable German-engineered sedan is easily ruined by the weak bass of the factory audio system. Of course you could fit any number of bulky subwoofer systems in the Jetta's big trunk compartment but suddenly it wouldn't be so big anymore.

Fortunately JL Audio has the perfect Stealthbox® solution for the Jetta... one that totally transforms the audio system serves as the perfect starting point for a superior JL Audio sound system and preserves your precious trunk space too!

The Stealthbox® for this model of Jetta sneaks into the little nook behind the driver side rear wheel and houses a robust 10-inch subwoofer. The result is visually unobtrusive but delivers plenty of quality and impact.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W1v3-2 subwoofer in a sealed enclosure. 300 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Black steel mesh woofer grille is included. Installs in driver-side corner of trunk compartment.

SB-VW-JETSW/10W3v3

When you're behind the wheel the Jetta Sportwagen's autobahn-inspired road feel easily lets you forget the 33 cu.ft. of cargo space behind you but chances are that utility played a big role in your purchasing decision. To keep both sides of your brain satisfied we've engineered an absolutely no-compromise Stealthbox® solution that takes up zero useful space while delivering spine-tingling JL Audio sub-bass.

A precisely tuned sealed enclosure houses a potent 500 watt 10-inch subwoofer driver and installs invisibly underneath the spare tire (within the spare tire well). None of the wagon's under-floor cargo compartments are sacrificed with installation leaving plenty of room for one or more of our compact XD or HD amplifiers (or any other items you may want to carry hidden from view).


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 in a down-firing sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in spare tire well... spare tire installs onto the Stealthbox®. If vehicle is equipped with a 16-inch spare tire installation requires purchase of an OEM 15-inch spare tire.

SB-VW-NB/10W3v3

Our design for VW's brilliant little car is considerate of its limited hatch space fitting under the spare tire and allowing the spare to fit back over it. The overall height of the floor is only slightly raised allowing you to keep the majority of your precious storage space. A powerful 10-inch subwoofer fires down into the spare tire well and pressurizes the Beetle's cabin like a much bigger conventional sub.


The Hard Data: Contains one 10W3v3-2 in a sealed enclosure. 500 watt power handling. Wired for 2 ohm mono. Installs in spare tire well... spare tire installs onto the Stealthbox® raising hatch floor 3 inches from stock height. A special kit and replacement hatch floor is provided to raise the entire hatch floor maintaining its flatness. Stealthbox® can be installed without the spare tire creating a 1-inch bulge. To remove spare tire the Stealthbox® must be unbolted from under the car. VW Dealer-installed CD changer may require notching of the floor provided with Stealthbox® depending on where it is installed. Will not fit convertible model.

@98@^GAS - JL Audio^@^GAS - JL Audio^@98@^http://www.jlaudio.com/tr570-cxi-car-audio-tr-coaxial-systems-91031^@^Connection Systems^@^TR570-CXi: 5 x 7 / 6 x 8-inch (125 x 180 mm) Coaxial Speaker System^@^TR570-CXi^@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_a4c87442e562a66c16ef5e385094ce8f.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/product_image/thm/t670_a4c87442e562a66c16ef5e385094ce8f.jpg?1426543231^@@@@^

TR570-CXi

Coaxial Speaker System: 5 x 7 / 6 x 8-inch (125 x 180 mm) Woofer 0.5-inch (12 mm) Textile Balanced Dome Tweeter


The Evolution TR systems have stood the test of time by delivering unsurpassed value and performance in their price class.

Many people mistakenly believe that an oval speaker cannot perform as well as a round one leading to many instances of 5.25-inch speakers being installed into 5 x 7-inch openings. JL Audio has put in the engineering time and effort to create fantastic-sounding speakers that drop into oval openings and deliver equivalent performance to our 6.5-inch (165 mm) round speaker systems... guaranteed. So don't make the mistake of losing cone area and efficiency by stepping down to a smaller round speaker... these ovals are as impressive as our round format systems.

The TR570-CXi system features 5 x 7 / 6 x 8-inch (125 x 180 mm) woofers with mineral-filled polypropylene cones long excursion capabilities and stamped steel frames. The woofer design benefits from JL Audio's vast woofer design experience and advanced modeling systems.

Tweeters are coaxially mounted and built with 0.5-inch textile diaphragms that deliver clean response on and off axis. The small size of the TR tweeter minimizes tweeter protrusion allowing TR coaxials to fit behind most factory speaker grilles.

Grilles are not available for this speaker system.

Sonic character: Clear and Efficient

Sold as a pair.

The 6.5-inch (165 mm) format is a direct fit in many vehicles. Multiple mounting patterns are provided on the woofer frame for easy installation into most vehicles that accept a 6.5-inch (165 mm) speaker.

XD-PCS2-2B

Premium 2 AWG 12V Power Connection System for Two Amplifiers


Everything* you need to make secure high-integrity power connections to two amplifiers with combined fuse ratings up to 150A. This kit features our high-capacity ANL Master Fuse Block a Maxi®-fused distribution block and our bolt-on master ground lug for maximum performance.

What's in the kit?



  • XD-MFBU-ANL Fuse Holder with 150A ANL Blade Fuse

  • XD-FDBU-2 Fused Distribution Block*

  • 20 ft. (6.1 m) Blue 2 AWG Premium Power Wire terminated with ring

  • 8 ft. (2.4 m) Blue 4 AWG Premium Power Wire

  • 8 ft. (2.4 m) Clear 4 AWG Premium Ground Wire terminated with a ring on each end

  • 20 ft. (6.1 m) Blue Remote Turn-On Lead Wire

  • Bolt-On Master Ground Lug

  • Rubber Firewall Grommet

  • Nylon Wire Ties

  • Hex Wrench for Fuse Holder


Bonus: Additional 1-year warranty on JL Audio amplifier when installed by authorized dealer with this Power Connection System!


The supplied 150A ANL blade fuse installs into the Master Fuse Block near the battery. It is appropriate to protect the main power wire in the event of a short circuit.

*You will also need to purchase the appropriate Maxi® fuses for installation into the Fused Distribution Block. These need to be selected based on the specific fuse rating of the amplifiers you are installing and for that reason are not included with this kit.

^@279.99@^$ 279.99^@^USD^@@

XD-PCS8-1B

Premium 8 AWG 12V Power Connection System for One Amplifier


Everything you need to make secure high-integrity power connections to a single amplifier with up to a 40A fuse rating. Our compact Maxi® Master Fuse Block is easy to install and allows you to accurately fuse your amplifier. A beefy self-tapping ground screw is also included to help you achieve a solid ground. As with all our Premium kits the power wire is true AWG-spec pure OFC copper.


What's in the kit?



  • XD-MFBW-MAXI Fuse Holder with Genuine 40A Maxi® Fuse

  • 19 ft. (5.8 m) Blue 8 AWG Premium Power Wire terminated with ring

  • 3 ft. (0.9 m) Clear 8 AWG Premium Ground Wire terminated with ring

  • 20 ft. (6.1 m) Blue Remote Turn-On Lead Wire

  • Self-Tapping Ground Screw

  • Rubber Firewall Grommet

  • Nylon Wire Ties

  • Hex Wrench for Fuse Holder


Bonus: Additional 1-year warranty on JL Audio amplifier when installed by authorized dealer with this Power Connection System!


This kit is appropriate for single amplifiers with fuse ratings from 20A to 40A. Depending on the specific fuse rating of your amplifier you may need to purchase an appropriate Maxi® fuse separately.

XD1000/1v2

Monoblock Class D Subwoofer Amplifier 1000 W x 1 @ 2 Ω / 600 W x 1 @ 4 Ω - 14.4V
column5: title=XDv2 Spec ICON" longdesc="Technology Icons" usemap="90697" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XDv2_Spec_LOGO_ALT.png?1397881282" alt="XDv2 Spec ICON" width="120" height="115" />
column6: width=640
column15:
title=XD1000/1v2 Product Spotlight" longdesc="Video Thumbnails" usemap="89985" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XD1000_1v2_PS_Thumb.jpg?1373516609" alt="XD1000/1v2 Product Spotlight" width="240" height="135" />

This potent monoblock subwoofer amplifier employs our high-speed NexD™ switching design to achieve unprecedented efficiency and amazing power output in a very compact chassis. The XD1000/1v2 is capable of delivering 1000 W of continuous power into a 2 ohm load (14.4V 1% THD) making it a great choice to drive higher power subwoofer systems.

Designed specifically for subwoofer applications the XD1000/1 includes a variable slope low-pass filter with continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz and a defeatable infrasonic filter (30 Hz 24 dB/oct.). The XD1000/1v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately) the amplifier's level can be directly controlled from the driver's seat.

This amplifier features a black powder-coat finish and a gasketed brushed aluminum cover for the controls.

Download the XDv2: Monoblock Amplifiers Catalog Sheet

^@599.99@^$ 599.99^@^USD^@@

XD1000/5v2

5-Channel Class D System Amplifier 100 W x 4 @ 2 Ω + 600 W x 1 @ 2 Ω - 14.4V
column7:
title=XDv2 Spec ICON" longdesc="Technology Icons" usemap="90697" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XDv2_Spec_LOGO_ALT.png?1397881282" alt="XDv2 Spec ICON" width="120" height="115" />

The XD1000/5v2 delivers up to 1000 W of clean power and is ideal for an audiophile-grade subwoofer + four satellite system. With this potent amplifier you can drive two pairs of quality component speaker systems with plenty of clean power (75 W x 4 @ 4 Ω) while also delivering a stout 600 W of power to a subwoofer system. The breakthrough that makes this much power possible in such a small chassis is our NexD™ switching amplifier design.

The XD1000/5v2 includes a 12 dB / octave high-pass filter for one main channel pair a 12 dB octave high-pass or bandpass filter for the other main channel pair plus a variable slope low-pass filter for its subwoofer channel. All three filters offer continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz. This amplifier's filters can also be configured as a true 3-way crossover with a low-pass filter for the subwoofer channel a bandpass filter on Ch. 3 &
column8: 4 and a high-pass filter on Ch. 1 &amp
column12:
2 high-pass filter allows its cutoff frequency to be adjusted from 50-500 Hz or 500-5000 Hz.

The XD1000/5v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately) the amplifier's level can be directly controlled from the driver's seat.

This amplifier features a black powder-coat finish and a gasketed brushed aluminum cover for the controls.

The breakthrough that makes this much power possible in such a small chassis is our NexD™ ultra-high-speed switching design which allows for full bandwidth Class D operation with extremely low distortion and outstanding efficiency.

The XD200/2v2 includes a 12 dB / octave filter which can be configured as a low-pass or high-pass filter and offers continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz.

The XD200/2v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately) the amplifier's level can be directly controlled from the driver's seat.

This amplifier features a black powder-coat finish and a gasketed brushed aluminum cover for the controls.

The XD400/4v2 includes a 12 dB / octave filter for each channel bank which can be configured as a low-pass or high-pass filter and offers continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz.

The XD400/4v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. column5: title=XDv2 Spec ICON" longdesc="Technology Icons" usemap="90697" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XDv2_Spec_LOGO_ALT.png?1397881282" alt="XDv2 Spec ICON" width="120" height="115" />

column15:
title=XD500/3 Product Spotlight" longdesc="Video Thumbnails" usemap="89985" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XD500_3_PS_Thumb.jpg?1373578695" alt="XD500/3 Product Spotlight" width="240" height="135" />

This compact amplifier is ideal for a simple audiophile-grade subwoofer / satellite system. With the XD500/3v2 you can drive a pair of quality component speaker systems with plenty of clean power while also delivering a stout 300 W to your subwoofer system. The breakthrough that makes this much power possible in such a small chassis is our NexD™ switching design.

The XD500/3v2 includes a 12 dB / octave high-pass filter for its main channels plus a variable slope low-pass filter for its subwoofer channel. Both filters offer continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz.

The XD500/3v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately) the amplifier's level can be directly controlled from the driver's seat.

This amplifier features a black powder-coat finish and a gasketed brushed aluminum cover for the controls.

This potent monoblock amplifier employs our high-speed NexD™ switching design to achieve unprecedented efficiency and amazing power output in a very compact chassis. Don't let the small size fool you though... this amplifier is capable of serious subwoofer power delivering a full 600 W of continuous power into a 2 ohm load (14.4V 1% THD).

Targeted specifically for subwoofer applications the XD600/1v2 includes a variable slope low-pass filter with continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz.

The XD600/1v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately) the amplifier's level can be directly controlled from the driver's seat.

This amplifier features a black powder-coat finish and a gasketed brushed aluminum cover for the controls.

XD600/6v2

6-Channel Class D Full-Range Amplifier 100 W x 6 @ 2 Ω / 75 W x 6 @ 4 Ω - 14.4V
column7: title=XDv2 Spec ICON" longdesc="Technology Icons" usemap="90697" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XDv2_Spec_LOGO_ALT.png?1397881282" alt="XDv2 Spec ICON" width="120" height="115" />
column17:
title=XD600/6 Product Spotlight" longdesc="Video Thumbnails" usemap="89985" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XD600_6_PS_Thumb.jpg?1373519063" alt="XD600/6 Product Spotlight" width="240" height="135" />

This incredibly flexible amplifier packs a serious full-range punch and delivers a staggering 100 watts to each of its six channels into 2 ohms (14.4V 1% THD). The breakthrough that makes this much power possible in such a small chassis is our NexD™ ultra-high-speed switching design which allows for full bandwidth Class D operation with extremely low distortion and outstanding efficiency.

With the XD600/6v2 you have lots of great options. Use it as a six-channel satellite amplifier with 75 W x 6 @ 4 Ω or bridge four of its channels to create a staggered power four-channel amplifier with 200 W x 2 @ 4 Ω for your front satellites and 75 W x 2 @ 4 Ω for your rear satellites. You can also drive two subwoofers with 200 W each plus a pair of satellites with 75W x 2.

The XD600/6v2 includes a 12 dB / octave filter for each channel bank which can be configured as a low-pass or high-pass filter and offers continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz.

The XD600/6v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately) the amplifier's level can be directly controlled from the driver's seat.

This amplifier features a black powder-coat finish and a gasketed brushed aluminum cover for the controls.

The XD700/5v2 is ideal for a complete audiophile-grade subwoofer + four satellite system and it fits comfortably in just about any vehicle. With this incredible little amplifier you can drive two pairs of quality component speaker systems with plenty of clean power (75 W x 4 @ 4 Ω) while also delivering a stout 300 W of power to a subwoofer system. The breakthrough that makes this much power possible in such a small chassis is our NexD™ switching design.

The XD700/5v2 includes a 12 dB / octave high-pass filter for one main channel pair a 12 dB octave high-pass or bandpass filter for the other main channel pair plus a variable slope low-pass filter for its subwoofer channel. All three filters offer continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz. This amplifier's filters can also be configured as a true 3-way crossover with a low-pass filter for the subwoofer channel a bandpass filter on Ch. 3 &
column18: 4 and a high-pass filter on Ch. 1 &amp
column22:
2 high-pass filter allows its cutoff frequency to be adjusted from 50-500 Hz or 500-5000 Hz.

The XD700/5v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately) the amplifier's level can be directly controlled from the driver's seat.

This amplifier features a black powder-coat finish and a gasketed brushed aluminum cover for the controls.

XD800/8v2

8-Channel Class D Full-Range Amplifier 100 W x 8 @ 2 Ω / 75 W x 8 @ 4 Ω - 14.4V
column6: title=XDv2 Spec ICON" longdesc="Technology Icons" usemap="90697" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XDv2_Spec_LOGO_ALT.png?1397881282" alt="XDv2 Spec ICON" width="120" height="115" />
column16:
title=XD800/8v2 Product Spotlight" longdesc="Video Thumbnails" usemap="89985" src="http://mediacdn.jlaudio.com/media/mfg/9013/media_image/dev_1/XD800_8v2_PS_Thumb.jpg?1373517227" alt="XD800/8v2 Product Spotlight" width="240" height="135" />

The XD800/8v2 is the industry's first Class D amplifier to offer eight channels of full-range output capability and is capable of delivering a staggering 100 watts to each of its eight channels @ 2 ohms (14.4V 1% THD). The breakthrough that makes this much power possible in such a small chassis is our NexD™ ultra-high-speed switching design which allows for full bandwidth Class D operation with extremely low distortion and outstanding efficiency.


The XD800/8v2 includes a 12 dB / octave filter for each channel bank which can be configured as a low-pass or high-pass filter and offers continuously variable cutoff frequency selection from 50-500 Hz.


The XD800/8v2 also features the v2 Spec feature set which consists of automatic turn-on capability (via signal sensing or DC-offset sensing) and a dual-range differential-balanced input section able to handle a wide range of input voltage levels. With the addition of an HD-RLC remote level control (sold separately) you have the ability to control the level of two four or all eight of the amplifier's channel levels from the driver's seat.


Here are a few examples of how the XD800/8v2 can be used:



  • Eight-channel Satellite Amp: drive four pairs of speakers with 75 W x 8

  • Big Four-Channel Satellite Amp: bridge to produce 200W x 4 @ 4Ω

  • Six-Channel System Amp: drive front and rear satellites with 75 W x 4 @ 4Ω plus two 4Ω subwoofers with 200 W each

  • Staggered Six-Channel Satellite Amp: drive front speakers with 200 W x 2 @ 4Ω plus four 4Ω speakers with 75 W each

  • Staggered Five-Channel Satellite Amp: drive three front speakers with 200 W @ 4Ω + rear speakers with 75 W x 2

  • Four-Channel System Amp: drive left and right speakers with 200W x 2 @ 4Ω plus two 4Ω subwoofers with 200W each

This amplifier features a black powder-coat finish and a gasketed brushed aluminum cover for the controls.


Download the XDv2: Full-Range Amplifiers Catalog Sheet

ZR525-CSi

2-Way Component System: 5.25-inch (130 mm) Woofer 1-inch (25 mm) Aluminum Dome Tweeter


Our reference quality ZR component speakers are made for those seeking the highest possible levels of audio performance and are the pinnacle of the JL Audio component speaker lineup.

The C5-525 component system features 5.25 inch (130 mm) component woofers with die-cast alloy baskets and Kurt Müller cones and suspensions. The woofer design benefits from JL Audio's vast woofer design experience and advanced modeling systems.

The ZR component tweeters included in this system feature 1-inch aluminum domes with rubber-roll suspensions that damp unwanted ringing while delivering spectacular high-frequency extension. A flush-mounting fixture with a classy electro-formed ring provides a sophisticated touch in any installation.

ZR crossover networks are bi-amp capable and built with super-premium component parts including U.S.-made Mills™ resistors mounted on an extruded aluminum heat sink polypropylene capacitors and segmented air-core inductors. Five levels of tweeter attenuation are provided as well as four levels of mid-range presence adjustment for twenty possible voicing combinations!

Woofer grilles are included each consisting of a black grille tray and a black steel mesh grille with an electroformed "
